title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
description: A tragic love story set against the backdrop of the atrocities committed by Joseph Kony and the Lord's Resistance Army.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
description: Goolo follows the story of a disabled boy with dreams of playing professional football. He adopts the name Onyango after his idol, and decides to try his luck at a football competition. .

title: Joker: Folie Ã  Deux
description: An action-packed tale of a Ugandan woman who becomes a hero as she fights against a human trafficking syndicate.

title: Mufasa: The Lion King
description: An action-adventure centered around the picturesque Sipi Falls and the struggle to protect it from environmental degradation.

title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
description: A romantic drama that uncovers the underbelly of Kampala, where love and betrayal intersect in unexpected ways.

title: Hit Man
description: A moving tale of a young woman whose terminal illness leads her to make a series of wishes, impacting her family and friends profoundly.
